message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I believe I can offer you $150 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $165 right now.  This product is in high demand and I'm confident in its value.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the current market and my budget, I am willing to offer $160 for the product.
